test.subject: english
test.name: Tiếng Anh 10 - Unit 6: Gender Equality
test.description: Kiểm tra từ vựng về Bình đẳng giới và ngữ pháp Câu bị động với động từ khuyết thiếu (Modals).

questions.question: Choose the word whose underlined part is pronounced differently.
questions.explanation: Gender: 'e' phát âm /e/ nhưng chú ý âm 'g' là /dʒ/. Ở đây câu hỏi về nguyên âm/phụ âm kết hợp. Nếu xét nguyên âm: gender /e/, enroll /əʊ/, preference /e/, secondary /e/. (Enroll khác). Nếu xét phụ âm đầu (thường gặp ở bài này): gender /dʒ/, còn lại /g/ không áp dụng. Đáp án đúng nhất cho sự khác biệt rõ rệt là Enroll (/əʊ/ vs /e/).

questions.question: Choose the word with a different stress pattern.
questions.explanation: Eliminate nhấn âm 2. Các từ còn lại nhấn âm 1.

questions.question: We should ________ gender discrimination in education.
questions.explanation: Should + V nguyên thể. Eliminate: xóa bỏ.

questions.question: Gender ________ should be promoted in all areas of life.
questions.explanation: Cần danh từ làm chủ ngữ. Gender equality: bình đẳng giới.

questions.question: Women should be given equal ________ to men.
questions.explanation: Equal rights: quyền bình đẳng.

questions.question: This job can ________ by both men and women.
questions.explanation: Bị động với độn từ khuyết thiếu: Can + be + V3.

questions.question: More girls should be allowed ________ to school.
questions.explanation: Allow sb to V / Be allowed to V.

questions.question: Discrimination based on gender must ________.
questions.explanation: Must be + V3 (bị động).

questions.question: In the past, women were often forced ________ at home.
questions.explanation: Force sb to V (ép buộc ai làm gì).

questions.question: The government has made efforts to ________ the gap between men and women.
questions.explanation: Bridge the gap: thu hẹp khoảng cách.

questions.question: Both genders should be treated ________ at work.
questions.explanation: Cần trạng từ bổ nghĩa cho động từ 'treated'.

questions.question: Choose the correct sentence with Modal Passive.

options.text: The report must be finish by tomorrow.
The report must finished by tomorrow.
The report must be finished by tomorrow.
The report must finish by tomorrow.

questions.explanation: Must be + V3 (finished).

questions.question: Domestic ________ is a serious problem in many countries.
questions.explanation: Domestic violence: bạo lực gia đình.

questions.question: Women often earn less than men for doing the ________ job.
questions.explanation: The same job: công việc giống hệt nhau.

questions.question: Find the synonym of 'prevent'.
questions.explanation: Prevent = Stop (ngăn chặn).

questions.question: Many women struggle to balance work and ________.
questions.explanation: Cân bằng giữa công việc và gia đình.

questions.question: Education is key to ________ women.
questions.explanation: Key to + V-ing/Noun (chìa khóa để làm gì).

questions.question: A surgeon is a doctor who performs ________.
questions.explanation: Perform operations: thực hiện phẫu thuật.

questions.question: Information should be ________ with everyone in the team.
questions.explanation: Should be shared (cần được chia sẻ).

questions.question: We must not ________ people based on their gender.
questions.explanation: Discriminate: phân biệt đối xử.
